title: Thirty Minute Bread and Butter Pickles

instructions.1: In a medium microwave safe bowl, mix cucumber, salt, onion, mustard seeds, SPLENDA® Granulated Sweetener, distilled white vinegar, celery seed and turmeric.
instructions.2: Microwave on high 7 to 8 minutes, stirring twice, until cucumbers are tender and onion is translucent.
instructions.3: Transfer to sterile containers. Seal and chill in the refrigerator until serving.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the onion from Step 1 being used?
Is onion from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is cucumbers from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is splenda® granulated sweetener live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the onion in Step 2?
Can we mix (Step 1) and microwave (Step 2) at the same time?
